A fast and open replacement for Windows: विंडोज़ और OS X के लिए एक तेज़ तथा ख़ुला प्रतिस्थापन
What the press is saying about elementar: हमारे बारे में प्रेस क्या कह रहा है:
&ldquo;elementary OS is different… a bea: “elementary OS अलग है… एक सुन्दर और शक्तिशाली ऑपरेटिंग सिस्टम जो पुरानी PC यों में भी अच्छी तरह से चलेगा”
&ldquo;a fast, low-maintenance platform: “एक तेज़, कम रखरखाव मंच जो वस्तुतः कहीं भी स्थापित किया जा सकता”
&ldquo;Lightweight and fast… Completely: “हल्का और तेज़… पूरी तरह से समुदाय आधारित, और डिज़ाइन तथा दिखावेकी असली सूझ है.”
Import, organize, and edit photos. Make: Import, organize, and edit photos. Make a slideshow. Share with Facebook or Flickr.
Organize and listen to your music. Brows: Organize and listen to your music. Browse by albums, use lightning-fast search, and build playlists of your favorites.
Watch movies and videos with a minimal i: Watch movies and videos with a minimal interface. The slim, dark frame fades away so you can see more of your movie.
Surf the web with a fast &amp; lightweig: Surf the web with a fast & lightweight web browser. Midori lets you use HTML5 websites and web apps while being lighter on battery life.
Display all your apps in an alphabetized: Display all your apps in an alphabetized grid. Flick through and find the one you want.
View your apps automatically organized i: View your apps automatically organized into categories. Perfect for large collections.
Launch apps, open settings panes, run co: Launch apps, open settings panes, run commands, and more from the lightning fast search view.
Our code is available for review, scruti: Our code is available for review, scrutiny, modification, and redistribution by anyone.
We don't make advertising deals and we d: We don't make advertising deals and we don't collect sensitive personal data. Our only income is directly from our users.
We're built on Linux: the same software: We're built on Linux: the same software powering the U.S Department of Defense, the Bank of China, and more.
We recommend 64-bit for most modern comp: हम अधिकांश आधुनिक कम्प्यूटरों के लिए 64-bit की सिफ़ारिश करतें हैं. मदद और अधिक जानकारी के लिए, देखें
